metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26926 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in jasper before 2.0.25. An out of bounds read issue was found in jp2_decode function whic may lead to disclosure of information or program crash.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
